attributes.additional_details: The UK government has decided to ban fizzy refill drinks to "tackle obesity". This makes it so if you want another drink, you need to buy another meal which makes people more obese. I believe that this a bad idea and this can also cause protests across the country. If you unban fizzy drink refills, people will be happy
attributes.background: Unban refills on fizzy drinks in cafes and restaurants

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Revoke regulations that restrict promotion of high sugar/fat food and drink" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/745031
